definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 试述抗生素药物有关物质检查的意义？

sentences.english: There's been a big hubbub this past week about antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的一周，进行了一场关于抗生素的嘈杂的讨论。

sentences.english: Antibiotic use is half of the drug-resistance equation, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，抗生素的应用占耐药性原因的一半。

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血压及胃酸过多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期间禁用。

sentences.english: Subsequent excision and drainage were performed after antibiotic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素治疗后进行切除和引流治疗。

sentences.english: Chemical allopathic veterinary drugs and antibiotics is prohibited .
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用化学对抗疗法的兽药和抗生素。

sentences.english: Initial screening of animals suspected of having antibiotic residues is conducted using the Swab Test On Premises (STOP).
sentences.chinese: 对怀疑带有抗生素残留的动物的最初检测采用棉签法。

sentences.english: And now, seafood laced with potentially unhealthy levels of antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 如今还有抗生素水平可能不健康的海鲜。

sentences.english: The study of gene engineering of macrolide antibiotics have made the rapid and exciting progress.
sentences.chinese: 大环内酯类抗生素的基因工程研究进展十分迅速。

sentences.english: All patients were treated with a full course of postoperative antibiotic treatment. No cases of recurrent infection were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 术后所有患者给予全程抗生素治疗，无感染复发。

sentences.english: Tens of millions of pounds of antibiotics are used in animal feed every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年，数以千万英镑的抗生素被使用在动物饲料中。

sentences.english: Apply an antibiotic ointment to the tattooed skin while it's healing.
sentences.chinese: 纹身的恢复期需要坚持涂抹抗生素药膏，预防感染。

sentences.english: Maked use of antibiotics and give support therapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素的应用和支持疗法。

sentences.english: To observe the clinic effects of preventive application of antibiotic in incision of perineum in postpartum.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察产后会阴切口预防性应用抗生素的临床效果。

sentences.english: Result The findings showed positive correlation between irrational use of antibiotics and nosocomial infections.
sentences.chinese: 结果医院感染发生率与抗生素不合理应用呈正相关。

sentences.english: Study on the inhibitory effect of antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 研究了抗生素的抑制效应。
